Love and the Spanish

Authors André François
Year 1964
Origin United Kingdom
Tagged non-fiction culture Penguin Helvetica illustration red
Type book cover
Reference RS.010.0140

About

The arrows pattern was actually used for all the covers in the Penguin Modern Economics series.
